title: She is a Great Demon Hunter - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Demons   Doctors   Doting Parents   Fat Protagonist   Fat to Fit   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Quirky Characters   Shameless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: Grumpy Crab   暴躁的螃蟹
description: After five hundred years, Great Demon Hunter Mi Wan was reborn into the modern era. With the strength to crush all demon clans, she opened an expensive pet shop. A single diagnosis costs three hundred thousand dollars, and for a million dollars, she can expel and treat demon poison. However, due to her unstable spiritual power after rebirth, Mi Wan will go into a coma whenever her spiritual power is depleted, and her soul will fly to the male protagonist’s side. The male protagonist is the current demon king who possesses the highest demon level, has a hobby of buying land and building parks, is devoted to the peaceful coexistence between humans and demons, and protecting the environment.>
